title: Update Join button to redirect to Google Form

requirements.text: Remove the 'coming soon' alert from the Join button in WaitlistCTA component

quotes: The current 'Join' button shows a 'coming soon' alert. Please remove that alert entirely.

acceptanceCriteria: Clicking the Join button no longer triggers any alert
No 'coming soon' text appears when the button is clicked

requirements.text: Make the Join button redirect to https://forms.gle/nD95mzMCvfRbBFZV7 when clicked

quotes: Instead, make the button redirect to this URL when clicked:(https://forms.gle/nD95mzMCvfRbBFZV7)

acceptanceCriteria: Clicking the Join button opens https://forms.gle/nD95mzMCvfRbBFZV7 in a new tab
The redirect happens immediately on button click
The original page remains open while the form opens in a new tab

constraints: Only modify the WaitlistCTA component button behavior
Preserve all existing button styling and animations
nonGoals: Changing the button text or appearance
Adding form validation or data collection
